scripts.build:doc: set -uex; yarn run build:doc:html; yarn run build:doc:md
scripts.test:built: set -uex; yarn run build; mocha test/built
scripts.test:coverage: nyc _mocha test/unit test/int && nyc report -r html && nyc check-coverage
scripts.test:watch: yarn run watch 'mocha --bail test/unit test/int || exit 1'
scripts.release:test: set -uex; yarn test; npm version prerelease; npm publish --access public --tag testing
scripts.release:patch: set -uex; git pull; rm -rf node_modules; yarn; yarn run test:coverage; yarn run test:lint; yarn run build:doc; npm version patch; git push; npm publish --access public; git push --tags
